notFound.title: Page not found.
notFound.text:
It looks like you've stumbled upon an out-of-order Secret Keeper or Marauder's Map. We may need Almost-Headless-Nick's help to guide you back to the main corridor of Hogwarts. Don't worry, even Harry has gotten lost in the Room of Requirement at one time or another.

Try ’Accio Home’ or cast teleportation by pressing
notFound.text2: to start a new magical journey!

contact.title: It's good to see you here.
contact.description: If you have any questions, suggestions or just want to chat, I'm at your disposal! You can send me an email or find me on social media. I can't wait to chat with you!

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Which of the deathly hallows would you like to possess?
